entry.string: Your PHP configuration does not seem to include the required LDAP extension. Please refer to http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.ldap.php on how to install it.
entry.translation: Yuoor PHP cunffeegooreshun dues nut seem tu incloode-a zee reqooured LDEP ixtenseeun. Bork bork bork! Pleese-a reffer tu http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.ldap.php oon hoo tu instell it. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: LDAP Error: Connection to server #(1) port_number #(2) failed
entry.translation: LDEP Irrur: Cunnecshun tu serfer #(1) purt_noomber #(2) feeeled

entry.string: LDAP Error: Failed to set LDAP Protocol version to 3
entry.translation: LDEP Irrur: Feeeled tu set LDEP Prutucul ferseeun tu 3

entry.string: LDAP Error: Failed to start TLS
entry.translation: LDEP Irrur: Feeeled tu stert TLS

entry.string: LDAP Error: Search LDAP base_dn #(1) filter #(2) failed
entry.translation: LDEP Irrur: Seerch LDEP bese-a_dn #(1) feelter #(2) feeeled
